name: Color Rings (itch)
description:
Color rings is one of best and very addictive and exciting puzzle game, match the correct minimum three ring in board on the row or column.
Complete puzzling rings challenge and get the score as high as you can.
When you put rings in a vertical or horizontal or diagonal line with same color, it will disappear and freeing up space for new rings.
Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score as well.
There are three types of play mode 1. Normal mode, 2. Diamond mode, 3. Single ring mode.
Features :
- Easy to play coloring ring match game.
- Hours of fun, exciting play and great ring puzzle game.
- No time limits.
- Extremely smooth touch control.
- It’s totally FREE, no internet connection required.
- Peaceful sound.
- Colorful and addictive graphics.
- Fit for all age groups.
